name: Super Mado Paf!!
description:
The sequel to Mado Paf!  (from the year 2017) is finally here!

This game is currently in version 0.00, so in a sense it would be like early access.

Better versions of the game might come in the future, so consider this as a kind of prototype.

Any feedback is welcome.

Install instructions:

Extract the .rar file, and launch the MadoPaf.EXE .

Controls:

ALT + XQuit game (At any time of the game).XSkip splash screen (In splash screen).
Start new game (In title screen).
Shoot a chain (In game screen).EscapeQuit Game (In title screen).
Exit a title screen (In game screen (watch out, don't ask for if you wan't exit!))CursorsMove Madotsuki (In game screen).
